content: So I'm excited to see #43466 land, and as far as I can tell all the boxes have been checked as of #74430. What happens between the stabilization issue getting merged, and the feature appearing in the next release (1.47?)? I don't see it listed on the release notes yet, even though the latest mentioned version is dated 4 days in the future so I assume the release notes accumulates entries before the actual release, so I would have expected to see it by now. Or is my count off by 6 weeks, and the stabilization means that it's going to hit beta in 4 days and stable in 6 weeks?
it needs to ride the release trains through beta, until the 1.47 release on thursday it's still nightly-only
The only way I remember what comes out when: https://forge.rust-lang.org/#current-release-versions
Also, note that #74430 is marked 1.48 -- I'm not sure who/what is putting those on, but thank you whomever did that

Yes, triagebot assigns those labels on PR merge. We've not yet perfected updating them for backports, but that will happen soon too, I expect, and for now I'm manually updating without too much trouble.
ye used to be a hassle earlier to manually make certain prs with a milestone and then update it if it misses a release date :grinning:
